medical_history.chief_complaint: Left elbow pain five years after total elbow arthroplasty.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced chronic recurring symptoms of infection persisting for years after elbow arthroplasty. Pain recurred eight months post-surgery, and again thirteen months later. The onset of fever and malaise occurred five months after this, with cloudy fluid draining from a small sinus track.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Open reduction and internal fixation of a comminuted left distal humeral fracture.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is a laborer and continued working with the injured arm despite discomfort.
